REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4699 reute d f BC-IDENTIX-<IDXX>-GETS-B 03-17 0040

TEXT.TITLE: IDENTIX <IDXX> GETS BANKAMERICA <BAC> ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Identix Inc said it has sold 59 IDX-10 and IDX-50 identity verification systems to BankAmerica Corp for undisclosed terms. It said deliveries have already started. Reuter
